document.forum_title: U.S. appeals court restores Brady's 'Deflategate' suspension
document.discussion_title: Mark Landler on Trump and Cruz
document.topic_text: "They speak in extremely robust, muscular, hawkish rhetoric. But if you dig a little bit deeper their positions actually have a little bit of an isolationist tinge to it."
document.post: "They speak in extremely robust, muscular, hawkish rhetoric. But if you dig a little bit deeper their positions actually have a little bit of an isolationist tinge to it."
